addOnCard.freeCountNote: First add-on card complimentary for cards issued before September 17, 2024
addOnCard.note: Add-on card fees unchanged for FIRST Private Credit Cards per Feb 2025 update

latePayment.note: LPC on FIRST Private Credit Card is NIL

fees.cardReplacementNote: Metal Credit Cards (Ashva, Mayura, and FIRST Private) have no replacement fee

rentFee.note: 1% fee on rent payments through third-party platforms with minimum ₹249

educationFee.note: 1% fee on education payments via third-party platforms like CRED, PayTM, Cheq, MobiKwik

existingRelationship.note: Card is exclusively offered to IDFC FIRST Bank Private Banking customers. Requires NRV of ₹50 lakhs to ₹1 crore in deposits/investments.

creditLimit.factors: Minimum ₹20 lakh credit limit. Final limit based on income, credit score, and relationship with bank
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Based on spending patterns, repayment history, and relationship value

gracePeriod.note: Up to 48 days interest-free credit period

cashAdvance.note: 0% interest on cash withdrawal at global ATMs. Flat fee of ₹199 + GST per transaction

baseRate.effectivePercentageNote: 6.67% when redeemed at ₹1/point on travel, 1.67% at standard ₹0.25/point

rewards.earningText: Earn 10 Reward Points for every ₹150 spent on eligible transactions (w.e.f 17th June 2025)

exclusions.note: Standard exclusions apply. Fuel, EMI, Cash withdrawals do not earn reward points

monthly.bonusPointsNote: Maximum 25,000 bonus Reward Points can be earned per month on travel bookings

annual.redemptionCapNote: Maximum redemption of 3,00,000 Reward Points per year

memberships.name: Club ITC Culinaire Hotel Membership
memberships.condition: Applicable for cards issued on or after June 1, 2025

welcome.description: 50,000 Reward Points and Club ITC Culinaire Hotel Membership on joining fee payment (cards issued on/after June 1, 2025)

renewal.condition: On payment of annual fee (applicable for cards renewed on or after July 1, 2025)

birthday.karmaDonationNote: Bank donates 10% of birthday spends (up to ₹25,000) as Karma Points to chosen charity

allSpends.note: 10X Reward Points on all eligible monthly spends

insurance.note: 1X Reward Point on insurance premium payments

international.note: 10X Reward Points on international transactions with 0% forex markup

bankPortal.name: Travel & Shop (IDFC FIRST Bank Mobile App)

hotelBookings.note: 50 Bonus + 10 Base = 60 Reward Points per ₹150 on hotel bookings (40% at ₹1/point)

flightBookings.note: 20 Bonus + 10 Base = 30 Reward Points per ₹150 on flight bookings (20% at ₹1/point)

bankPortal.capNote: Maximum 25,000 bonus Reward Points per month on travel bookings
bankPortal.note: Bonus Reward Points apply only to transactions completed without redeeming Reward Points

karmaPoints.donationNote: When Karma Points pool crosses 20,000 (₹5,000 in value), points get donated to chosen charity
karmaPoints.exclusions: Fuel, EMI, Insurance transactions, Cash withdrawals, rental and property transactions
karmaPoints.note: 1 Karma Point per ₹100 on spends above ₹30,000 per statement cycle

redemption.bestOption: Travel bookings (flights & hotels) via Travel & Shop section on IDFC FIRST Bank Mobile App

pointsPlusPay.note: Reward Points can only be used to cover up to 70% of total booking value. Remaining must be paid with FIRST Private Credit Card

options.description: Flight & Hotel bookings via Travel & Shop on IDFC FIRST Bank Mobile App
options.note: Best value redemption at ₹1 per point (effective from June 1, 2025)
25% Reward Points credited back when redeeming for charity donation

transferPartners.note: IDFC FIRST Bank does not offer airmiles transfer partners - a key limitation compared to competitors like HDFC Infinia or Axis Magnus

rewards.specialLogic: Karma Points are a unique feature - earned on spends above ₹30,000/month and donated to charity

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for lounge access

guestAccess.note: 4 complimentary visits for accompanying guests per year at domestic airport lounges

spaAccess.note: Unlimited complimentary spa access at domestic airports

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for international lounge access

international.prebookingRequired: Some international lounges require pre-booking via 1800-1234-109 or helpdesk@dreamfolks.in

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for railway lounge access

railway.note: Unlimited complimentary railway lounge access across India

lounge.addOnCardNote: Both primary and add-on cardholders get unlimited domestic and international lounge and spa access

milestones.conditions: Cumulative spends of ₹15 lakh within first 6 months of card issuance and renewal

milestones.benefit: Club ITC Culinaire Hotel Membership Renewal
milestones.conditions: Spends exceeding ₹40 lakhs in previous card anniversary year

domestic.note: Unlimited free golf rounds and lessons every month

international.note: One complimentary round per quarter at select international golf destinations

golf.courses: Premier courses in India and select international destinations
golf.note: Book via https://idfcfirst.truztee.com/ using registered email ID

movies.offer: ₹750 off on movies, non-movies & food combos
movies.note: Maximum discount per transaction is actual value or ₹750, whichever is lower. Available twice per month.

programs.name: ITC Hotels (Visa offer)
programs.offer: Pay for 2 consecutive nights and extend stay with complimentary 3rd night

programs.name: The Postcard Hotel & Resorts
programs.note: Flat discount of ₹7,500 on minimum booking of ₹25,000

programs.name: Dine with Visa
programs.offer: Exclusive access to premium restaurants across India with curated menus

programs.name: The Quorum Club
programs.note: 20% privilege on Standard Membership and 20% savings at select non-member restaurants

hotelMemberships.name: Club ITC Culinaire
hotelMemberships.renewalCondition: Renewed annually upon spends exceeding ₹40 lakhs
hotelMemberships.benefits: Premium hotel and dining benefits at ITC properties

hotelMemberships.name: Accor Plus Explorer
hotelMemberships.benefits: Hotel membership benefits at Accor properties

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver with no capping on FIRST Private Credit Card

forex.markupText: 0% Forex Markup on all international transactions

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency

forex.note: Zero forex markup is a standout feature for international spenders

concierge.note: Visa Infinite platform services including concierge, meet & greet, and airport transfers

meetAndGreet.note: Complimentary and discounted Meet & Greet services via Visa

airportTransfer.note: Lucrative discounts on airport transfer limousine service

roadsideAssistance.note: Complimentary RSA all over India, up to 4 times per year worth ₹1,399

memberships.name: Club ITC Culinaire Hotel Membership
memberships.condition: On joining fee payment (cards issued on or after June 1, 2025)
memberships.note: Premium ITC Hotels membership with dining and stay benefits

pay2Stay3.note: Pay for 2 consecutive nights, get 3rd night complimentary

airAccident.condition: Ticket must be booked with card

travelAndAirAccident.note: Travel and Air accident insurance up to Rs. 2.5 crore

baggageDelay.note: For essential purchases when baggage delayed more than 12 hours

lostPassport.note: Covers expenses for procuring replacement passport and travel documents

tripCancellation.note: Trip cancellation cover for 2 claims up to ₹50,000 per year on flight and hotel bookings

fraudLiability.coverNote: Zero Card Liability Cover (Lost Card Liability, Counterfeit/Skimming/Phishing and Online Fraud Protection) up to ₹50,000

insurance.note: All insurance covers are subject to terms in the policy document. Claims must be intimated within 30 days of occurrence. Air Accident and Travel Insurance covers apply only if ticket is booked using the credit card.

upgradesFrom.note: IDFC FIRST Wealth cardholders may be considered for upgrade

upgradePathway.note: This is IDFC FIRST Bank's top-tier credit card. No upgrades available. Invite-only based on Private Banking relationship.

meta.bestFor: High-net-worth individuals who travel frequently, want zero forex markup, unlimited lounge access, and value lifestyle benefits over airmiles transfer
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those seeking airmiles transfer partners, low spenders, or those not part of IDFC FIRST Private Banking

rating.note: Excellent travel and lifestyle benefits but lacks airmiles transfer partners which limits reward value compared to competitors

meta.verdict: IDFC FIRST Private Credit Card is a well-rounded ultra-premium card with exceptional travel benefits including zero forex markup, unlimited lounge access, and complimentary golf. The June 2025 revaluation significantly improved reward value with 1:1 redemption on travel bookings. However, the ₹50,000 annual fee and lack of airmiles transfer partners remain key limitations compared to competitors like HDFC Infinia or Axis Magnus Burgundy. Best suited for HNIs who prioritize travel lifestyle benefits over points optimization.
pros: Zero forex markup on international transactions
Unlimited domestic and international airport lounge access
10X reward points on all spends (6.67% effective rate with travel redemption)
No late payment or over-limit charges
Club ITC Culinaire and Accor Plus memberships included
cons: High annual fee of ₹50,000 + GST with no waiver option
No airmiles transfer partners - major limitation for points enthusiasts
Only 70% of booking value can be redeemed with points
Low redemption value (₹0.25) for non-travel redemptions
Monthly bonus points cap of 25,000 on travel bookings
dataSource: IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card Product Guide

changelog.change: Reward Points earning base changed from ₹100 to ₹150
Redemption value improved to ₹1 per point on Travel & Shop bookings
Welcome benefits updated to include 50,000 points + Club ITC Culinaire membership
Renewal benefit updated to 25,000 Reward Points
Accelerated rewards introduced on Travel & Shop portal (50 bonus on hotels, 20 bonus on flights)
Add-on card fee structure changed - first add-on no longer complimentary for new cards
changelog.source: IDFC FIRST Bank fees and charges
